briefTitle: Evaluation of a Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) Blood Screening Assay

interventions.name: collection of follow-up sample based on PRISM HIV O Plus result

arms.label: ABBOTT PRISM HIV O Plus assay for Specificity
ABBOTT PRISM HIV O Plus Assay for Sensitivity

summary: To test blood samples from volunteer donors of whole blood and blood components using a new investigational test that detects human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection. Results will be compared to the current HIV screening assay.

primaryOutcome.measure: PRISM HIV O Plus Test Data for Specificity
